name: Penalizable Forbidden item
author: Alucard648
info:
"Cheating bastard! DIE"
Made on request by SkyFlare.
description: Variant of banning items with penalty for even accidental usage - deals damage and warps Link away.
setup: 1.Set up 2 consecutive combos, invisibla one, then auto-side warp.2. Set up side warp A - warp destination3. Place FFC with 1st combo from step 1 and script assigned. D0-D3 - ID of forbidden items. 5 banned items total. D5 - String to display on violation. D6 - Damage to deal as penalty, in addition to warp, in 1/16th of heart. D7 - 1-> Confiscate forbidden item from Link`s inventory. +2->Save game immediately to seal penalty in save file. +4 - charge 50% rupees fine.
